secret: a random secret string of at least 64 characters
user_password: The password used to log in to the app, hashed with password_hash()
uploaded_file_path: the path to store uploaded files at, e.g. /path/to/public_html/uploads/
uploaded_file_url: the relative URL path to uploads, e.g. /uploads
timezone: A DateTimeZone-compatible timezone identifier, e.g. Europe/London
